data.eml:eml: Cryophilic Isotomidae (Collembola) of the Northwestern Rocky Mountains, U. S. A.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fjellberg, Arne (2010): Cryophilic Isotomidae (Collembola) of the Northwestern Rocky Mountains, U. S. A. Zootaxa 2513: 27-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196078
